ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is guidance and good news for the muminun,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: A guidance and good tidings for the believers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: a guidance and good tidings for the believers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They are glad news and guidance for the believers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: A guidance and glad tidings for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: A guide and glad tidings for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A guidance and good news for the believers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: a guidance, and good tidings unto the believers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A guidance and good tidings for believers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: it is guidance and good news for the believers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: A guidance and glad tidings unto the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: a guidance and good news for the faithful
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: A guide: and glad tidings for the believers,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: A guide (to the Right Path); and glad tidings for the believers [who believe in the Oneness of Allah (i.e. Islamic Monotheism)].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: a guidance and glad tidings to believers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Guidance and good news for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: As guidance and good tidings for the believers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:2] It is, a guidance, guiding from error, and good tidings for the believers, who believe in it, of Paradise;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A guidance) from error (and good tidings) that they will gain Paradise (for believers) who are true in their faith.
